TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Marshal extends System.Object
public ref class Marshal abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供方法的集合，方法用於配置 Unmanaged 記憶體、複製 Unmanaged 記憶體區塊和將 Managed 類型轉換為 Unmanaged 類型，也包括其他和 Unmanaged 程式碼互動時使用的方法。

span.span: Provides a collection of methods for allocating unmanaged memory, copying unmanaged memory blocks, and converting managed to unmanaged types, as well as other miscellaneous methods used when interacting with unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `static`上定義的方法類別是必要項目使用的 unmanaged 程式碼。The `static` methods defined on the class are essential to working with unmanaged code. 此類別中定義的大部分方法通常供開發人員想要提供 managed 與 unmanaged 程式設計模型之間的橋樑。Most methods defined in this class are typically used by developers who want to provide a bridge between the managed and unmanaged programming models. 比方說，方法將 ANSI 字元從指定的字串 （在 managed 堆積中） 複製到 unmanaged 堆積中的緩衝區。For example, the method copies ANSI characters from a specified string (in the managed heap) to a buffer in the unmanaged heap. 它也會配置正確大小的目標堆積。It also allocates the target heap of the right size. Common language runtime 提供特定的封送處理功能。The common language runtime provides specific marshaling capabilities. 如需封送處理行為的詳細資訊，請參閱[Interop 封送處理](~/docs/framework/interop/interop-marshaling.md)。For details on marshaling behavior, see [Interop Marshaling](~/docs/framework/interop/interop-marshaling.md). `Read`並`Write`中的方法類別支援對齊和未對齊的存取。The `Read` and `Write` methods in the class support both aligned and unaligned access. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用所定義的各種方法類別。The following example shows how to use various methods defined by the class. [!code-cpp[Marshal#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/cpp/marshal.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Marshal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/CS/Marshal.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Marshal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/VB/Marshal.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通用語言執行平台管理的 COM 物件的參考計數，讓您使其不必直接使用這個方法。The common language runtime manages the reference count of a COM object for you, making it unnecessary to use this method directly. 在罕見的情況下，例如測試自訂封送處理器，您可能會發現需要手動操作物件的存留期。In rare cases, such as testing a custom marshaler, you might find it necessary to manipulate an object's lifetime manually. 之後呼叫，您必須使用一種方法，例如遞減參考計數。After calling , you must decrement the reference count by using a method such as . 請勿依賴的傳回值，有時可能不穩定。Do not rely on the return value of , as it can sometimes be unstable. 您可以呼叫， ，或來取得值，表示[IUnknown](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)介面指標。You can call , , or to obtain an value that represents an [IUnknown](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface pointer. 您也可以使用這些方法和取得 managed 的物件的 COM 可呼叫包裝函式所表示的 COM 介面的 managed 物件上的方法。You can also use these methods and the method on managed objects to obtain the COM interfaces represented by the managed object's COM callable wrapper. 如果您不熟悉此包裝函式類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[COM 可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)。If you are not familiar with the details of this wrapper type, see [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的兩個記憶體配置方法之一是類別。 is one of two memory allocation methods in the class. (是另。)這個方法會公開 Win32 [LocalAlloc](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148628)函式，從 Kernel32.dll。( is the other.) This method exposes the Win32 [LocalAlloc](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148628) function from Kernel32.dll. 當呼叫`LocalAlloc`，它會傳遞`LMEM_FIXED`旗標，這會導致鎖定就地配置的記憶體。When calls `LocalAlloc`, it passes a `LMEM_FIXED` flag, which causes the allocated memory to be locked in place. 此外，配置的記憶體不是零填滿。Also, the allocated memory is not zero-filled. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫 方法。The following example demonstrates calling the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: if there are any RCWs available for cleanup; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有深入的相依性圖形的 managed 和原生程式碼之間的參考很多可能需要很長的時間來清除所有物件。If there are a lot of references between managed and native code with deep dependency graphs it can take a long time for all the objects to clean up. 每次 GC 執行時它會釋出一些 Rcw，接著將發行的基礎 COM 物件。Each time a GC runs it will free up some number of RCWs, which will in turn release the underlying COM objects. 這些 COM 物件將然後釋放其受管理的參考，以進行更多的物件可以清除在下一次 GC 執行時，用來啟動處理程序透過一次。Those COM objects will then release their managed references and make more objects available for cleanup the next time a GC runs, which starts the process over again. 方法可讓應用程式，來判斷多少循環的 GC。收集和 GC。WaitForPendingFinalizers 必須進行才能清除所有項目。The method provides a way for the application to determine how many cycles of GC.Collect and GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers need to happen in order to clean everything up.

summary.span: 通知執行階段清除配置在目前內容中的所有執行階段可呼叫包裝函式 (RCW)。

span.span: Notifies the runtime to clean up all Runtime Callable Wrappers (RCWs) allocated in the current context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它會嘗試清除 Rcw 時，interop 系統會激發訊息。The interop system pumps messages while it attempts to clean up RCWs. 這可確保的清除作業中所有的應用程式，包括應用程式，不會被提取經常發生的單一執行緒 apartment (STA) Rcw。This ensures that cleanup for single-threaded apartment (STA) RCWs happens in all applications, including applications that do not pump often enough. 不過，進行適當地幫浦的某些應用程式是非常敏感幫浦作業發生的位置。However, some applications that do pump appropriately are very sensitive to where pumping occurs. 當 interop 系統中，請在這些應用程式，在未預期的位置提取訊息，應用程式可能會遇到的重新進入的問題很難診斷。When the interop system pumps messages in these applications, in places that are unexpected, , the application can encounter reentrancy issues that are difficult to diagnose. 因此，應用程式需要能夠控制自己提取作業，如特定 STA 及控制清除的 Rcw。Therefore, applications need to be able to control their own pumping for a particular STA and to control the clean-up of RCWs. 不過，開發人員通常只控制他們的應用程式中的執行緒的子集，並因此將無法確定會適當地提取所有執行緒。However, developers often only control a subset of the threads in their application and thus cannot ensure that all threads are pumping appropriately. 若要解決此問題：To solve this problem: 1. 使用方法，以關閉 自動清除的 Rcw，並發生時，每個執行緒為基礎的訊息幫浦作業。Use the method to turn off automatic cleanup of RCWs, and the message pumping that occurs, on a per-thread basis. 這可讓開發人員若要退出自動清除，以及對應的訊息幫浦作業。This allows developers to opt out of automatic clean-up, and the corresponding message pumping. 2. 使用方法來通知執行階段清除配置在目前的內容中的所有 Rcw。Use the method to notify the runtime to clean up all RCWs that are allocated in the current context. 此方法可讓開發人員執行階段會在目前內容中執行清除時，精確地控制。This companion method allows developers to precisely control when the runtime performs cleanup in the current context.

summary.span: 從 Unmanaged 記憶體指標將資料複製到 Managed 8 位元不帶正負號的整數 (Unsigned Integer) 陣列。

span.span: Copies data from an unmanaged memory pointer to a managed 8-bit unsigned integer array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非受控，C 樣式陣列未包含界限的詳細資訊，以防止`startIndex`和`length`從要驗證的參數。Unmanaged, C-style arrays do not contain bounds information, which prevents the `startIndex` and `length` parameters from being validated. 因此，若要對應的 unmanaged 的資料`source`參數填入受管理的陣列，不論其實用性。Thus, the unmanaged data corresponding to the `source` parameter populates the managed array regardless of its usefulness. 您必須呼叫這個方法之前初始化 managed 的陣列具有適當的大小。You must initialize the managed array with the appropriate size before calling this method. ## Examples 下列範例會將陣列複製到 unmanaged 記憶體，並接著將未受管理的陣列複製回 managed 記憶體。The following example copies an array to unmanaged memory and then copies the unmanaged array back to managed memory. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy-byte#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy-byte/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy-byte#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy-byte/vb/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將某個 COM 類別類型，通常的基底轉換`__ComObject`類型，另一個的 COM 類別類型。 converts one COM class type, typically the base `__ComObject` type, to another COM class type. 輸入的 COM 物件，表示參數所`o`，為[執行階段可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)(RCW)。The input COM object, represented by parameter `o`, is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW). 同時`t`並`o`參數必須是的類別與屬性會設定其簽章。Both the `t` and `o` parameters must be classes whose signatures are attributed with . [Tlbimp.exe （型別程式庫匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具適用於此屬性為您匯入類型程式庫時。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool applies this attribute for you when it imports a type library. 如果在原始程式碼中手動建立 RCW 時，您應該套用這個屬性代表以表示其 COM 來源原始 coclass 的 managed 簽章。If you create the RCW manually in source code, you should apply this attribute to the managed signature that represents the original coclass to signify its COM origins. Tlbimp.exe 會匯入 COM [coclass](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/333d0904-ffa2-4d25-878d-7422bcd40582)做為受管理的類別和介面。Tlbimp.exe imports a COM [coclass](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/333d0904-ffa2-4d25-878d-7422bcd40582) as a managed class and an interface. Coclass 介面具有相同的名稱作為原始 coclass，且受管理的類別具有原始 coclass 名稱加上 「 類別 」。The coclass interface has the same name as the original coclass, and the managed class has the original coclass name appended with "Class". Coclass 的呼叫，例如`MyCoclass`會變成在 coclass 介面稱為`MyCoclass`而受管理的類別稱為`MyCoclassClass`。For example, a coclass called `MyCoclass` becomes a coclass interface called `MyCoclass` and a managed class called `MyCoclassClass`. 由於`t`必須是類別，而不介面，請務必指定 managed 的類別 (`MyCoclassClass`) 和不 coclass 介面。Since `t` must be a class, not an interface, be sure to specify the managed class (`MyCoclassClass`) and not the coclass interface. > [!NOTE] > 您無法的輸入 COM 物件，因為新的 RCW 執行個體包裝的身分識別[IUnknown](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)原始 RCW 所公開的指標。You lose the identity of the input COM object because a new RCW instance wraps the [IUnknown](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) pointer exposed by the original RCW.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將 COM 物件的類型轉換`T`至`TWrapper`COM 類別型別。 converts a COM object of type `T` to the `TWrapper` COM class type. 輸入的 COM 物件，表示參數所`o`，為[執行階段可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)(RCW)。The input COM object, represented by parameter `o`, is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW). 這兩個`T`泛型型別參數和`o`參數必須是的類別與屬性的簽章會屬性。Both the `T` generic type parameter and the `o` parameter must be classes whose signatures are attributed with the attribute. [Tlbimp.exe （型別程式庫匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具適用於此屬性為您匯入類型程式庫時。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool applies this attribute for you when it imports a type library. 如果在原始程式碼中手動建立 RCW 時，您應該套用這個屬性代表以表示其 COM 來源原始 coclass 的 managed 簽章。If you create the RCW manually in source code, you should apply this attribute to the managed signature that represents the original coclass to signify its COM origins. Tlbimp.exe 會匯入 COM [coclass](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/333d0904-ffa2-4d25-878d-7422bcd40582)做為受管理的類別和介面。Tlbimp.exe imports a COM [coclass](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/333d0904-ffa2-4d25-878d-7422bcd40582) as a managed class and an interface. Coclass 介面具有相同的名稱作為原始 coclass，且受管理的類別具有原始 coclass 名稱加上 「 類別 」。The coclass interface has the same name as the original coclass, and the managed class has the original coclass name appended with "Class". Coclass 的呼叫，例如`MyCoclass`會變成在 coclass 介面稱為`MyCoclass`而受管理的類別稱為`MyCoclassClass`。For example, a coclass called `MyCoclass` becomes a coclass interface called `MyCoclass` and a managed class called `MyCoclassClass`. 因為`T`必須是類別，而不介面，請務必指定 managed 的類別 (`MyCoclassClass`) 而非`coclass`介面。Because`T` must be a class, not an interface, be sure to specify the managed class (`MyCoclassClass`) and not the `coclass` interface. > [!NOTE] > 您會遺失的輸入的 COM 物件，識別，因為新的 RCW 執行個體包裝[IUnknown](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)原始 RCW 所公開的指標。You lose the identity of the input COM object, because a new RCW instance wraps the [IUnknown](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) pointer exposed by the original RCW.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來釋放參考型別欄位，例如字串、 的 unmanaged 結構。You can use this method to free reference-type fields, such as strings, of an unmanaged structure. 不同於其欄位中，結構可以是實值型別或參考型別。Unlike its fields, a structure can be a value type or a reference type. 實值型別結構，其中包含實值型別欄位 (所有 blittable) 會有任何必須釋放其記憶體的參考。Value-type structures that contain value-type fields (all blittable) have no references whose memory must be freed. 方法會使用這個方法避免記憶體流失時重複使用的結構所佔用的記憶體。The method uses this method to prevent memory leaks when reusing memory occupied by a structure. 呼叫 COM [SysFreeString](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148633)函式，這樣反而會釋放已配置的字串。 calls the COM [SysFreeString](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148633) function, which, in turn, frees an allocated string. 除了，則類別會提供兩個其他記憶體解除配置方法：和。In addition to , the class provides two other memory-deallocation methods: and .

summary.span: 藉由將執行階段可呼叫包裝函式 (RCW) 的參考計數設定為 0，釋放對 RCW 的所有參考。

span.span: Releases all references to a Runtime Callable Wrapper (RCW) by setting its reference count to 0.

returns.span: 與 參數建立關聯的 RCW 之參考計數的新值；如果釋放成功，則為 0 (零)。

span.span: The new value of the reference count of the RCW associated with the parameter, which is 0 (zero) if the release is successful.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會釋放 COM 物件的受管理的參考。The method releases the managed reference to a COM object. 呼叫這個方法就相當於呼叫迴圈，直到傳回 0 （零） 的方法。Calling this method is equivalent to calling the method in a loop until it returns 0 (zero). 當 COM 物件上的參考計數變成 0 時，COM 物件是通常釋出，雖然這取決於 COM 物件的實作，而且已超出控制項的執行階段。When the reference count on the COM object becomes 0, the COM object is usually freed, although this depends on the COM object's implementation and is beyond the control of the runtime. 不過，RCW 可以仍然存在，等待進行記憶體回收。However, the RCW can still exist, waiting to be garbage-collected. 無法使用的 COM 物件之後它已從基礎 RCW 分開。The COM object cannot be used after it has been separated from its underlying RCW. 如果您嘗試在 RCW 上呼叫方法，其參考計數變成 0 之後,就會擲回。If you try to call a method on the RCW after its reference count becomes 0, a will be thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像是和，您可以使用這個方法來解除配置記憶體。Like and , you can use this method to deallocate memory. 呼叫 COM [SysFreeString](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148633)函式，這樣會釋放任何下列的 unmanaged 方法所配置的記憶體： `SysAllocString`， `SysAllocStringByteLen`， `SysAllocStringLen`， `SysReAllocString`， `SysReAllocStringLen`。 calls the COM [SysFreeString](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148633) function, which frees memory allocated by any of the following unmanaged methods: `SysAllocString`, `SysAllocStringByteLen`, `SysAllocStringLen`, `SysReAllocString`, `SysReAllocStringLen`. 您可以呼叫 unmanaged 的方法，例如這些項目與平台叫用。You can call unmanaged methods such as these with platform invoke. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 Unmanaged DLL 函式](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For details, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用來釋放任何全域所配置的堆積記憶體， ，或任何對等項目未受管理的 API 方法。You can use to free any memory from the global heap allocated by , , or any equivalent unmanaged API method. 如果`hglobal`參數是方法不做任何動作。If the `hglobal` parameter is the method does nothing. 會公開[LocalFree](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148640)函式，從 Kernel32.DLL，好讓您可以不再使用的記憶體釋放所有位元組所指的`hglobal`。 exposes the [LocalFree](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148640) function from Kernel32.DLL, which frees all bytes so that you can no longer use the memory pointed to by `hglobal`. 除了，則類別會提供兩個其他記憶體解除配置 API 方法：和。In addition to , the class provides two other memory-deallocation API methods: and . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫 方法。The following example demonstrates calling the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Marshal#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/cpp/marshal.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Marshal#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/CS/Marshal.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Marshal#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/VB/Marshal.vb#4)] 下列範例示範如何將轉換的 managed 內容類別寫入 unmanaged 記憶體，然後再處置時完成的 unmanaged 記憶體。The following example demonstrates how to convert the contents of a managed class to unmanaged memory and then dispose of the unmanaged memory when done. remarks.format: ## Remarks 會公開 COM [GetActiveObject](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221467\(v=vs.85\).aspx) OLEAUT32 函式。DLL;不過，後者需要類別識別碼 (CLSID) 而不是程式設計識別項 (`ProgID`) 這個方法所預期。 exposes the COM [GetActiveObject](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221467\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function from OLEAUT32.DLL; however, the latter expects a class identifier (CLSID) instead of the programmatic identifier (`ProgID`) expected by this method. 若要取得沒有已註冊的 COM 物件的執行個體`ProgID`，使用平台叫用來定義 COM [GetActiveObject](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221467\(v=vs.85\).aspx)函式。To obtain a running instance of a COM object without a registered `ProgID`, use platform invoke to define the COM [GetActiveObject](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221467\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function. 如需說明平台叫用，請參閱 < [ 使用 Unmanaged DLL 函式](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For a description of platform invoke, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). ## ProgID 和 CLSIDProgID and CLSID 登錄的 HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT 子樹狀結構中的索引鍵包含各種不同的子機碼的類型。Keys in the HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT subtree of the registry contain a variety of subkey types. 子機碼的大部分都是將使用者易記的字串對應至 CLSID 的 Progid。Most of the subkeys are ProgIDs, which map a user-friendly string to a CLSID. 應用程式通常會使用這些人類看得懂的字串而不是數字的 Clsid。Applications often use these human-readable strings instead of the numeric CLSIDs. 通常，元件會有版本無關的 ProgID 對應至最新版的安裝系統的元件。Often, a component has a version-independent ProgID that is mapped to the latest version of the component that is installed on the system. 應用程式和元件主要使用 Progid 來擷取其對應的 Clsid。Applications and components primarily use ProgIDs to retrieve their corresponding CLSIDs. ## Examples 下列範例是以 Microsoft Word 的執行個體設定的電腦上執行的。The following example was run on a computer that was configured with a running instance of Microsoft Word. 沒有任何執行的 Microsoft Excel 的執行個體。There were no instances of Microsoft Excel running. 此範例會呼叫兩次。The example calls twice. 第一次呼叫嘗試擷取 Microsoft Word 的執行個體的參考 (執行個體`Word.Application`物件)。The first call tries to retrieve a reference to an instance of Microsoft Word (an instance of the `Word.Application` object). 第二次呼叫嘗試擷取 Microsoft Excel 的執行個體的參考 (執行個體`Excel.Application`物件)。The second call tries to retrieve a reference to an instance of Microsoft Excel (an instance of an `Excel.Application` object). 程式碼已成功擷取到的 Microsoft Word 執行個體的參考。The code retrieves a reference to an instance of Microsoft Word successfully. 不過，因為未執行 Microsoft Excel，嘗試擷取第二個物件引發。However, because Microsoft Excel is not running, the attempt to retrieve the second object raises a . [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetActiveObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.marshal.getactiveobject/cs/marshal.getactiveobject.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetActiveObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.marshal.getactiveobject/vb/marshal.getactiveobject.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回代表指定的物件上要求的介面的介面指標。This method returns an interface pointer that represents the requested interface on the specified object. 如果您有預期要傳遞的介面指標的 unmanaged 的方法，它會特別有用。It is particularly useful if you have an unmanaged method that expects to be passed an interface pointer. 這個方法與呼叫物件時，會導致遞增的介面指標上，才會傳回指標的參考計數。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 一律使用遞減參考計數，一旦完成指標。Always use to decrement the reference count once you have finished with the pointer. 您必須遵守使用原始 COM 介面指標時，COM 所定義的規則。You must adhere to the rules defined by COM when using raw COM interface pointers. 當呼叫方法會公開為 COM 物件參數時非常有用類型，或使用自訂封送處理。 is useful when calling a method that exposes a COM object parameter as an type, or with custom marshaling. 雖然較不常見，您可以使用這個方法的 managed 物件上，取得物件的 COM 可呼叫包裝函式的指標。Although less common, you can use this method on a managed object to obtain a pointer to the object's COM callable wrapper. 例如，您可以使用受管理的物件匯出至 COM，若要取得的介面指標上。For example, you can use on a managed object that is exported to COM to obtain an interface pointer for . 您無法取得類別介面的指標，因為類別介面缺少對應的型別，要傳遞給第二個參數 (`t`)。You cannot obtain a pointer to a class interface since a class interface lacks the corresponding type to pass to the second parameter (`t`). 請改用來叫用 COM 可呼叫包裝函式，這通常是自動分派類別介面的預設介面成員。Instead, use to invoke the members on the default interface of the COM callable wrapper, which is usually an auto-dispatch class interface. 方法多載預設會允許查詢介面自訂。The method overload allows query interface customization by default. 若要指定是否要套用查詢介面自訂，請使用方法多載。To specify whether to apply query interface customization, use the method overload. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[COM 可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)，[執行階段可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)，並[類別介面簡介](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024)主題。For additional information, see the [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md), [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md), and [Introducing the Class Interface](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024) topics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回介面指標，表示`TInterface`介面上指定的物件。This method returns an interface pointer that represents the `TInterface` interface on the specified object. 如果您有預期要傳遞的介面指標的 unmanaged 的方法，它會特別有用。It is particularly useful if you have an unmanaged method that expects to be passed an interface pointer. 這個方法與呼叫物件時，會導致遞增的介面指標上，才會傳回指標的參考計數。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 一律使用遞減參考計數，當您完成使用指標的方法。Always use the method to decrement the reference count when you have finished with the pointer. 您必須遵守使用原始 COM 介面指標時，COM 所定義的規則。You must adhere to the rules defined by COM when using raw COM interface pointers. 當呼叫方法會公開為 COM 物件參數時非常有用類型，或使用自訂封送處理。 is useful when calling a method that exposes a COM object parameter as an type, or with custom marshaling. 您也可以使用這個方法的 managed 物件上取得的指標物件的 COM 可呼叫包裝函式，雖然這是較不常見。You can also use this method on a managed object to obtain a pointer to the object's COM callable wrapper, although this is less common. 例如，您可以使用受管理的物件匯出至 COM，若要取得的介面指標上。For example, you can use on a managed object that is exported to COM to obtain an interface pointer for . 方法多載預設會允許查詢介面自訂。The method overload allows query interface customization by default. 若要指定是否要套用查詢介面自訂，請使用方法多載。To specify whether to apply query interface customization, use the method overload. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[COM 可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)，[執行階段可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)，並[類別介面簡介](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024)主題。For additional information, see the [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md), [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md), and [Introducing the Class Interface](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024) topics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回此方法的帳戶就是三個的以零為起始的位置編號[IUnknown](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)和四個可能[IDispatch](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5)方法，讓第一個可用插槽的值是 3 或 7。The zero-based slot number returned by this method accounts for three [IUnknown](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) and possibly four [IDispatch](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5) methods, making the value of the first available slot either 3 or 7. 提供的功能相反。 provides the opposite functionality of . 您可以使用這個方法來擷取位置的數字，不會顯示來自 COM 的介面的成員和私用介面的成員。You can use this method to retrieve slot numbers for members of interfaces that are not visible from COM and for members of private interfaces. 傳回的位置數字對應到資料表 v 數字，會保留，如果型別已公開至 com。The slot numbers returned correspond to the v-table numbers that would be reserved if the type was exposed to COM. COM 看不成員實際上會佔用公開 v 表中的位置，即使 COM 用戶端無法使用的位置。COM-invisible members actually occupy a slot in an exposed v-table, even though the COM client cannot use the slot. 您無法使用藉由傳遞的類別介面上自的類別。You cannot use on a class interface by passing from a class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[類別介面簡介](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024)。For additional information, see [Introducing the Class Interface](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 1.0 和 1.1 版的.NET framework 版本，則可以傳遞委派至 unmanaged 程式碼的 managed 的方法當作函式指標，讓未受管理的程式碼，以呼叫受管理的方法，透過函式指標。In versions 1.0 and 1.1 of the .NET Framework, it was possible to pass a delegate representing a managed method to unmanaged code as a function pointer, allowing the unmanaged code to call the managed method through the function pointer. 它也是可能要將該函式指標傳遞至 managed 程式碼中，unmanaged 程式碼和指標已正確地解析為基礎的 managed 方法。It was also possible for the unmanaged code to pass that function pointer back to the managed code, and the pointer was resolved properly to the underlying managed method. 在.NET Framework 2.0 和更新版本中，您可以使用和方法來封送處理兩個方向的委派。In the .NET Framework 2.0 and later versions, you can use the and methods to marshal delegates in both directions. 具有，`ptr`匯入為。With , `ptr` is imported as a . A可以取得受管理的委派，藉由呼叫和傳遞做為參數，它便可以呼叫從 unmanaged 方法內。A can be obtained for a managed delegate by calling and passed as a parameter; it can then be called from inside the unmanaged method. 請注意，參數封送處理器可以也封送處理.NET Framework 2.0 和更新版本中的委派函式指標。Note that the parameter marshaler can also marshal function pointers to delegates in the .NET Framework 2.0 and later versions. 方法具有下列限制：The method has the following restrictions: - 在 interop 的案例中不支援泛型。Generics are not supported in interop scenarios. - 您無法將無效的函式指標傳遞給這個方法。You cannot pass an invalid function pointer to this method. - 您可以使用這個方法只會針對純 unmanaged 函式指標。You can use this method only for pure unmanaged function pointers. - 您無法使用此方法以一貫的函式指標C++或從方法。You cannot use this method with function pointers obtained through C++ or from the method. - 您無法使用這個方法來建立從函式指標的委派給另一部受管理的委派。You cannot use this method to create a delegate from a function pointer to another managed delegate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回以零起始，v 資料表數目的介面或類別。This method returns the zero-based, v-table number for an interface or a class. 類別上使用時，傳回的位置數字是指類別介面的類別。When used on a class, the slot number returned refers to the class interface for the class. 如果自動雙重類別介面，此方法一律會傳回-1 表示僅分派介面不會公開給受管理的用戶端 v 資料表。If the class interface is auto-dual, this method always returns -1 to indicate that the dispatch-only interface does not expose a v-table to managed clients. 您可以使用並搭配將指定的範圍內的位置。You can use and in conjunction with to pass slots within a specified range. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[類別介面簡介](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024)。For additional information, see [Introducing the Class Interface](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來取得不必呼叫基礎 HRESULT方法 」 和 「 catch 例外狀況 （以避免相對應的效能額外負荷）。Use the method to get an based on an HRESULT without having to call the method and catch the exception (thus avoiding the corresponding performance overhead). `errorInfo`參數提供的錯誤，例如它的文字說明和定義錯誤之介面的全域唯一識別碼 (GUID) 的其他資訊。The `errorInfo` parameter supplies additional information about the error, such as its textual description and the globally unique identifier (GUID) for the interface that defined the error. 如果您有自訂的錯誤資訊，您必須提供轉換中，請使用這個方法多載。Use this method overload if you have custom error information that you have to supply in the conversion. 每一個 hresult 與其在.NET Framework 中的可比較的例外狀況類別的對應，請參閱[How to:對應 Hresult 和例外狀況](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For the mapping from each HRESULT to its comparable exception class in the .NET Framework, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派`d`轉換成可以傳遞至 unmanaged 程式碼使用的函式指標[__stdcall](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e212594b-1827-4d07-9527-7d412b300df8)呼叫慣例。The delegate `d` is converted to a function pointer that can be passed to unmanaged code using the [__stdcall](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e212594b-1827-4d07-9527-7d412b300df8) calling convention. 您以手動方式必須保留委派被記憶體回收行程收集從 managed 程式碼。You must manually keep the delegate from being collected by the garbage collector from managed code. 記憶體回收行程不會追蹤至 unmanaged 程式碼的參考。The garbage collector does not track references to unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 也會設定[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)介面，可由呼叫 COM GetErrorInfoNEEDGUID 函式的例外狀況。 also sets up an [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface for the exception that can be obtained by calling the COM GetErrorInfoNEEDGUID function. 您可以使用此函式傳回的 HRESULT 值上，您套用的 COM 介面的 managed 的類別實作屬性。You can use this function to return an HRESULT value on a managed class implementation of a COM interface where you apply the attribute. 已屬性化的方法攔截所有例外狀況，並使用方法來傳回適當的 HRESULT 值。Have the attributed method catch all exceptions and use the method to return the appropriate HRESULT value. 允許例外狀況傳播的方法之外，會產生不正確的行為。Allowing an exception to propagate outside the method produces incorrect behavior. （事實上，common language runtime 無法將例外狀況傳遞給 COM 用戶端呼叫 v 資料表透過這種方法。）(In fact, the common language runtime fails to pass an exception to a COM client that calls such a method through a v-table.) 請注意，方法會設定[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)目前執行緒的介面。Note that the method sets the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface of the current thread. 方法之類的這可能會造成非預期的結果預設使用的方法[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)目前的執行緒如果設定。This can cause unexpected results for methods like the methods that default to using the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) of the current thread if it is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在目標函式必須有`setLastError`設定中繼資料旗標。The target function must have had the `setLastError` metadata flag set. 例如，`SetLastError`欄位必須是`true`。For example, the `SetLastError` field of the must be `true`. 設定這個旗標的程序取決於所使用的來源語言：C#和C++會`false`根據預設，但`Declare`在 Visual Basic 中的陳述式`true`。The process for setting this flag depends on the source language used: C# and C++ are `false` by default, but the `Declare` statement in Visual Basic is `true`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何擷取對應至 Win32 錯誤程式碼使用 HRESULT方法。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve an HRESULT corresponding to a Win32 error code using the method. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetHRForLastWin32Error#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetHRForLastWin32Error/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetHRForLastWin32Error#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetHRForLastWin32Error/vb/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 managed 程式碼，您很少使用直接`IDispatch`介面。In managed code, you seldom work directly with the `IDispatch` interface. 不過，時呼叫的方法公開為 COM 物件參數很有用類型，或使用自訂封送處理。However, is useful when calling a method that exposes a COM object parameter as an type, or with custom marshaling. 這個方法與呼叫物件時，會導致遞增的介面指標上，才會傳回指標的參考計數。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 一律使用遞減參考計數，一旦完成指標。Always use to decrement the reference count once you have finished with the pointer. 您也可以使用這個方法的 managed 物件上，若要取得之物件的 COM 可呼叫包裝函式的介面指標。You can also use this method on a managed object to obtain an interface pointer to the COM callable wrapper for the object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[COM 可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)。For additional information, see [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md).

summary.span: 傳回使用平台呼叫最後一個 unmanaged 函式所傳回的錯誤碼叫用具有旗標設定。

span.span: Returns the error code returned by the last unmanaged function that was called using platform invoke that has the flag set.

returns.span: 藉由呼叫 Win32 SetLastError 函式設定的最後錯誤碼。

span.span: The last error code set by a call to the Win32 SetLastError function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows 系統上公開 Win32 [GetLastError](/windows/desktop/ms679360)函式，從 Kernel32.DLL。On Windows systems, exposes the Win32 [GetLastError](/windows/desktop/ms679360) function from Kernel32.DLL. 這個方法存在，因為它不是可靠地進行叫用呼叫的直接存取平台`GetLastError`取得此資訊。This method exists because it is not reliable to make a direct platform invoke call to `GetLastError` to obtain this information. 如果您想要存取此錯誤的程式碼，您必須呼叫反而比撰寫您自己的平台叫用定義`GetLastError`然後呼叫該元件。If you want to access this error code, you must call instead of writing your own platform invoke definition for `GetLastError` and calling it. Common language runtime 可以讓 Api 覆寫的內部呼叫`GetLastError`由作業系統維護。The common language runtime can make internal calls to APIs that overwrite the `GetLastError` maintained by the operating system. 您可以使用這個方法，以取得錯誤代碼，只有當您套用至方法簽章並將欄位設為`true`。You can use this method to obtain error codes only if you apply the to the method signature and set the field to`true`. 這個程序會有所不同，使用原始碼語言而定：C#和C++會`false`根據預設，但`Declare`在 Visual Basic 中的陳述式`true`。The process for this varies depending upon the source language used: C# and C++ are `false` by default, but the `Declare` statement in Visual Basic is `true`. 行為差異`GetLastWin32Error`上.NET Core 和.NET Framework 方法時是`true`。There is a difference in the behavior of the `GetLastWin32Error` method on .NET Core and .NET Framework when is `true`. .NET Framework 上`GetLastWin32Error`方法可以保留至下一個的 P/Invoke 呼叫的錯誤資訊。On .NET Framework, the `GetLastWin32Error` method can retain error information from one P/Invoke call to the next. 在.NET Core 上清除錯誤資訊 P/Invoke 呼叫之前和`GetLastWin32Error`表示只有最後一個方法呼叫的錯誤資訊。On .NET Core, error information is cleared before P/Invoke call, and the `GetLastWin32Error` represents only error information from the last method call. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫`GetLastWin32Error`方法。The following example calls the `GetLastWin32Error` method. 此範例會先示範如何呼叫的方法，而且有任何錯誤，並接著示範如何呼叫的方法，出現錯誤。The example first demonstrates calling the method with no error present and then demonstrates calling the method with an error present. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetLastWin32Error#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetLastWin32Error/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetLastWin32Error#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetLastWin32Error/vb/example.vb#1)]

public: static System::Object ^ GetObjectForIUnknown(IntPtr pUnk);
static member GetObjectForIUnknown : nativeint -> obj

param.name: pUnk
param.span: 指標介面。

span.span: A pointer to the interface.

summary.span: 傳回類型的執行個體，這個執行個體透過 IUnknown 介面指標來表示 COM 物件。

span.span: Returns an instance of a type that represents a COM object by a pointer to its IUnknown interface.

returns.span: 表示指定之 Unmanaged COM 物件的物件。

span.span: An object that represents the specified unmanaged COM object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會包裝`IUnknown`中受管理的物件。This method wraps `IUnknown` in a managed object. 這有遞增參考次數之 COM 元件的效果。This has the effect of incrementing the reference count of the COM component. 執行階段受管理的物件，表示 COM 物件上執行記憶體回收時，將會遞減參考計數。The reference count will be decremented when the runtime performs garbage collection on the managed object that represents the COM object. `pUnk`參數代表`IUnknown`介面指標; 不過，因為所有的 COM 介面直接或間接衍生自`IUnknown`，您可以將任何 COM 介面傳遞給這個方法。The `pUnk` parameter represents an `IUnknown` interface pointer; however, because all COM interfaces derive directly or indirectly from `IUnknown`, you can pass any COM interface to this method. 所傳回的物件已[執行階段可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)，通用語言執行平台管理，因為它沒有任何其他 managed 的物件。The object returned by is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md), which the common language runtime manages as it does any other managed object. 這個包裝函式的型別通常是基底`System.__ComObject`類型，這是隱藏的類型模稜兩可的包裝函式型別時使用。The type of this wrapper is often a base `System.__ComObject` type, which is a hidden type used when the wrapper type is ambiguous. 您仍然可以進行晚期繫結呼叫基底類型，只要 COM 琲[IDispatch](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5(vs.85))介面。You can still make late-bound calls to such a base type as long as the COM object implements the [IDispatch](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5(vs.85)) interface. 同樣地，您可以轉型成適當的 COM 介面傳回的物件。Likewise, you can cast the returned object to an appropriate COM interface. 要包裝的物件與特定的 managed 的類別類型 （而不是泛型包裝函式的型別），您必須遵守下列需求：For an object to be wrapped with a specific managed class type (and not a generic wrapper type), you must adhere to the following requirements: - 實作[IProvideClassInfo](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148012) COM 物件的介面。Implement the [IProvideClassInfo](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148012) interface for the COM object. - 註冊包含組件[Regasm.exe （組件登錄工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)。Register the containing assembly with the [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md). 或者，您可以避免這些需求，並仍取得使用與特定的 managed 的類別型別包裝的物件方法。Alternatively, you can avoid these requirements and still get an object that is wrapped with a specific managed class type by using the method.

Interopmarshaler 公開給 managed 程式碼的 VARIANT 類型時，會執行相同的轉換。The interopmarshaler performs the identical transformation when exposing a VARIANT type to managed code. 提供的功能相反。 provides the opposite functionality of . summary.span: 取得虛擬函式表 (v-table 或 VTBL) 中包含使用者定義之方法的第一個位置。

span.span: Gets the first slot in the virtual function table (v-table or VTBL) that contains user-defined methods.

returns.span: 包含使用者定義之方法的第一個 VTBL 位置。

span.span: The first VTBL slot that contains user-defined methods.

returns.span: 如果介面是以 IUnknown 為基礎，第一個插槽為 3，如果介面是以 [IDispatch](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5) 為基礎則為 7。

span.span: The first slot is 3 if the interface is based on IUnknown, and 7 if the interface is based on [IDispatch](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法傳回的介面或類別的以零為起始的 v 資料表號碼。This method returns the zero-based v-table number for an interface or a class. 類別上使用時，會傳回的位置編號是指類別介面的類別。When used on a class, the slot number that is returned refers to the class interface for the class. 如果自動分派類別介面，此方法一律會傳回-1 表示僅分派介面不會公開給受管理的用戶端 v 資料表。If the class interface is auto-dispatch, this method always returns -1 to indicate that the dispatch-only interface does not expose a v-table to managed clients. 您可以使用並搭配將指定的範圍內的位置。You can use and in conjunction with to pass slots within a specified range. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[類別介面簡介](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024)。For additional information, see [Introducing the Class Interface](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024).

param.name: pUnk
param.span: Unmanaged 物件的 介面指標。

span.span: A pointer to the interface of the unmanaged object.

param.name: t
param.span: 要求之 Managed 類別的類型。

span.span: The type of the requested managed class.

summary.span: 傳回表示 COM 物件之指定類型的 Managed 物件。

span.span: Returns a managed object of a specified type that represents a COM object.

returns.span: 對應於 物件 (代表要求的 Unmanaged COM 物件) 的類別執行個體。

span.span: An instance of the class corresponding to the object that represents the requested unmanaged COM object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `t`參數必須是 COM 匯入的類型或 COM 匯入型別的子型別。The `t` parameter must be either a COM-imported type or a subtype of a COM-imported type. 颾魤 ㄛ`t`必須是的類型，其中繼資料已匯入[Tlbimp.exe （型別程式庫匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具。In addition, `t` must be a type whose metadata was imported by the [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool. 此類型必須是類別和不相關聯的 coclass 介面，但這會帶來 COM 類別的名稱。This type must be a class and not an associated coclass interface, which carries the name of the COM class. 比方說，如果 Tlbimp.exe 匯入`Myclass`做為類別稱為`MyclassClass`為 coclass 介面呼叫`Myclass`，您必須使用`MyclassClass`(不`Myclass`) 使用此方法。For example, if Tlbimp.exe imports `Myclass` as a class called `MyclassClass` and as a coclass interface called `Myclass`, you must use `MyclassClass` (not `Myclass`) with this method. 如需有關匯入的類別和介面，coclass 的詳細資訊，請參閱[匯入型別轉換](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cb1ee67d-8ef0-4e40-b2a5-13714b9f33c3)。For additional information about imported classes and coclass interfaces, see [Imported Type Conversion](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cb1ee67d-8ef0-4e40-b2a5-13714b9f33c3). 如果物件已取得`pUnk`參數，`t`會被忽略，且會傳回現有的物件。If an object has already been obtained for the `pUnk` parameter, `t` is ignored and the existing object is returned. `pUnk` 代表[IUnknown](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)介面指標; 不過，因為所有的 COM 介面直接或間接衍生自`IUnknown`，您可以將任何 COM 介面傳遞給這個方法。`pUnk` represents an [IUnknown](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface pointer; however, because all COM interfaces derive directly or indirectly from `IUnknown`, you can pass any COM interface to this method. 所傳回的物件已[執行階段可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)(RCW)，通用語言執行平台管理，因為它沒有任何其他 managed 的物件。The object returned by is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW), which the common language runtime manages as it does any other managed object.

[Tlbimp.exe （型別程式庫匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具用來將轉譯的自訂封送處理器`ITypeInfo`參數來參數。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool uses the custom marshaler to translate `ITypeInfo` parameters to parameters. 不過，如果您取得`ITypeInfo`介面所提供部分表示 Tlbimp.exe 以外，您可以使用以手動方式執行相同的翻譯。However, if you obtain an `ITypeInfo` interface by some means other than Tlbimp.exe, you can use to manually perform the same translation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當組件匯出至類型程式庫時，型別程式庫會指派的 LIBID。When assemblies are exported to type libraries, the type library is assigned a LIBID. 您可以藉由套用，明確地設定 LIBID在組件層級，或它可以自動產生。You can set the LIBID explicitly by applying the at the assembly level, or it can be generated automatically. [Tlbimp.exe （型別程式庫匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具會計算組件的身分識別為基礎的 LIBID 值。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool calculates a LIBID value based on the identity of the assembly. 傳回相關聯的 LIBID ，如果已套用屬性。 returns the LIBID that is associated with the , if the attribute is applied. 否則，傳回導出的值。Otherwise, returns the calculated value. 或者，您可以使用方法，以從現有的型別程式庫中擷取實際的 LIBID。Alternatively, you can use the method to extract the actual LIBID from an existing type library. 請參閱[匯出組件的轉換](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3fffd8db-240f-4fde-a558-a5bcc01e1a86)文件庫識別項的詳細資訊的主題。See the [Exported Assembly Conversion](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3fffd8db-240f-4fde-a558-a5bcc01e1a86) topic for more information about library identifiers.

[Tlbimp.exe （型別程式庫匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具適用於此屬性為您匯入類型程式庫時。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool applies this attribute for you when it imports a type library. 另外兩個方法也會判斷指定的物件是否表示 COM 物件，但傳回的需求`true`不同於此方法的需求。Two other methods also determine whether a specified object represents a COM object, but the requirements for returning `true` differ from this method's requirements. 會傳回`true`類別 （或介面） 會與歸類直接; 它不會傳回`true`的衍生型別。 returns `true` if the class (or interface) is attributed with directly; it does not return `true` for derived types. 會傳回`true`如果型別化或衍生自具有相同 GUID 的型別。 returns `true` if the type is attributed with or derives from a type with the same GUID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回代表 unmanaged 記憶體中的方法簽章的參數所需的堆疊大小 （以位元組為單位）。The method returns the stack size (in bytes) needed to represent the parameters of a method signature in unmanaged memory. 請注意，這個方法的傳回值平台相依。Note that the return value of this method is platform-dependent. 比方說，具有單一整數參數的簽章會傳回的值為 4 的 32 位元平台和的值為 8，64 位元平台上。For example, a signature with a single integer parameter returns a value of 4 on 32-bit platforms and a value of 8 on 64-bit platforms.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供 unmanaged 的結構版面配置，不一定會對應至 managed 的結構配置的位移方面的位移。 provides the offset in terms of the unmanaged structure layout, which does not necessarily correspond to the offset of the managed structure layout. 封送處理結構可以轉換的版面配置，並改變位移。Marshaling the structure can transform the layout and alter the offset. `T`泛型類型參數可以是實值類型或格式化的參考類型 （使用其中一個的循序或明確配置）。The `T` generic type parameter can be a value type or a formatted reference type (with either a sequential or explicit layout). 您可以使用，以取得整個版面配置的大小方法。You can obtain the size of the entire layout by using the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設封送處理實值型別](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d9a876c-e05a-40ba-bd85-bd22877f984a)。For additional information, see [Default Marshaling for Value Types](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d9a876c-e05a-40ba-bd85-bd22877f984a). > [!NOTE] > 從.NET Framework 2.0 版中，可能會公開私用欄位。Beginning with the .NET Framework version 2.0, may expose private fields.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定工作提供早期的初始化，並會在叫用目標方法時自動執行。Setup tasks provide early initialization and are performed automatically when the target method is invoked. 第一次工作包括下列各項：First-time tasks include the following: - 正在驗證的平台叫用的中繼資料已正確地格式化。Verifying that the platform invoke metadata is correctly formatted. - 正在驗證所有受管理的型別是否有效的參數，平台叫用函式。Verifying that all the managed types are valid parameters of platform invoke functions. - 正在尋找和載入處理序的 unmanaged 的 DLL。Locating and loading the unmanaged DLL into the process. - 尋找進入點程序中。Locating the entry point in the process. 呼叫平台之外的方法上叫用沒有任何作用。Calling on a method outside of platform invoke has no effect. 若要執行安裝程式在所有平台上的工作叫用在類型中，使用的方法。To execute setup tasks on all platform invoke methods in a type, use .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常是必要的 COM interop 和平台叫用時結構參數會表示為值。 is often necessary in COM interop and platform invoke when structure parameters are represented as an value. 您可以將實值型別傳遞至這個多載方法。You can pass a value type to this overload method. 在此情況下，傳回的物件是經過 boxing 處理的執行個體。In this case, the returned object is a boxed instance. ## Examples 下列範例會建立受管理的結構、 將其傳輸至 unmanaged 記憶體中，並再將其傳輸回 managed 的記憶體使用方法。The following example creates a managed structure, transfers it to unmanaged memory, and then transfers it back to managed memory using the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會公開[iunknown:: Queryinterface](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) COM 物件，這會嘗試取得特定的介面指標的方法。The method exposes the [IUnknown::QueryInterface](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) method of a COM object, which attempts to obtain a specific interface pointer. 使用`QueryInterface`基礎為 COM 物件是 managed 程式碼中執行轉換作業相同。Using `QueryInterface` on a COM object is the same as performing a cast operation in managed code. 這個方法與呼叫物件時，會導致遞增的介面指標上，才會傳回指標的參考計數。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 一律使用遞減參考計數，一旦完成指標。Always use to decrement the reference count once you have finished with the pointer. 若要取得值，表示[IUnknown](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)介面指標，您可以呼叫， ，或。To obtain an value that represents a [IUnknown](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface pointer, you can call , , or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有隱含的位移為 0。 has an implied offset of 0. 這個方法可讓 unmanaged C 樣式位元組陣列，避免複製的整個的 unmanaged 的陣列的費用的直接互動 (使用) 到個別的 managed 陣列，再讀取其項目值。This method enables direct interaction with an unmanaged C-style byte array, eliminating the expense of copying an entire unmanaged array (using ) to a separate managed array before reading its element values. 支援讀取未配置的記憶體位置。Reading from unaligned memory locations is supported. ## Examples 下列範例會建立未受管理的記憶體區塊、 將位元組寫入 unmanaged 記憶體、 從 unmanaged 記憶體讀取位元組，然後處置 unmanaged 的記憶體。The following example creates a block of unmanaged memory, writes a byte to the unmanaged memory, reads the byte back from unmanaged memory, and then disposes the unmanaged memory. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte/vb/example.vb#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用方法來讀取的非受控的字元值。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to read the value of an unmanaged character. [!code-cpp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte/cpp/sample.cpp#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的兩種記憶體重新配置方法之一是類別。 is one of two memory reallocation methods in the class. (是另。)重新配置的記憶體內容的開頭等同於原始的內容;不過，整個記憶體區塊都可以在不同的位置。( is the other.) The beginning of the reallocated memory content is the same as the original content; however, the entire memory block can be in a different location. 這個方法會公開 COM [CoTaskMemRealloc](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148778)函式，這稱為 「 COM 工作記憶體配置器。This method exposes the COM [CoTaskMemRealloc](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148778) function, which is referred to as the COM task memory allocator.

(是另。)( is the other.) 這個方法會公開 Win32 [GlobalReAlloc](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148780)函式，從 Kernel32.dll。This method exposes the Win32 [GlobalReAlloc](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148780) function from Kernel32.dll. 傳回的指標可能不同於原始。The returned pointer can differ from the original. 如果不同，原始記憶體區塊的內容已複製到新的區塊，並釋出原始記憶體區塊。If it is different, the contents of the original memory block have been copied to the new block, and the original memory block has been freed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通用語言執行平台管理的 COM 物件的參考計數，讓您使其不必直接使用這個方法。The common language runtime manages the reference count of a COM object for you, making it unnecessary to use this method directly. 使用此值僅供測試用途。Use this value only for testing purposes. 在罕見的情況下，例如測試自訂封送處理器，您可能會發現需要手動操作物件的存留期。In rare cases, such as testing a custom marshaler, you might find it necessary to manipulate an object's lifetime manually. 只有程式呼叫應該呼叫。Only programs that call should call . 呼叫之後參考計數達到零會導致未定義的行為。Calling after the reference count has reached zero causes undefined behavior. 您可以呼叫， ，或來取得值，表示[IUnknown](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)釋放介面指標。You can call , , or to obtain an value that represents a [IUnknown](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface pointer to release. 您也可以使用這些方法和受管理的物件，表示釋放 managed 物件所表示的 COM 介面上的方法[COM 可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)。You can also use these methods and the method on managed objects to release the COM interfaces represented by the managed object's [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何擷取`IUnknown`介面的 managed 的物件，使用方法。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve an `IUnknown` interface for a managed object using the method. 範例接著會釋放介面指標呼叫方法。The example then releases the interface pointer by calling the method. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release/vb/example.vb#1)]

param.span: 要釋放的 COM 物件。

summary.span: 遞減與指定 COM 物件建立關聯之[執行階段可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW) 的參考計數。

span.span: Decrements the reference count of the [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW) associated with the specified COM object.

returns.span: 與 關聯的 RCW 之參考計數的新值。

span.span: The new value of the reference count of the RCW associated with .

returns.span: 這個值通常為零，因為不論呼叫的 Managed 用戶端數目，RCW 只保留一個包裝的 COM 物件參考。

span.span: This value is typically zero since the RCW keeps just one reference to the wrapped COM object regardless of the number of managed clients calling it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來明確控制用於從 managed 程式碼的 COM 物件的存留期。This method is used to explicitly control the lifetime of a COM object used from managed code. 您應該使用這個方法來釋放保留資源的參考，即時或以特定順序，就必須釋放物件的基礎 COM 物件。You should use this method to free the underlying COM object that holds references to resources in a timely manner or when objects must be freed in a specific order. 每次 COM 介面指標輸入 common language runtime (CLR)，則會將它包裝在 RCW。Every time a COM interface pointer enters the common language runtime (CLR), it is wrapped in an RCW. RCW 有每當 COM 介面指標對應到它就會遞增參考計數。The RCW has a reference count that is incremented every time a COM interface pointer is mapped to it. 方法遞減參考計數的 RCW。The method decrements the reference count of an RCW. 執行階段當參考計數到達零時，釋放 unmanaged 的 COM 物件上的所有其參考，並擲回如果您嘗試將進一步使用的物件。When the reference count reaches zero, the runtime releases all its references on the unmanaged COM object, and throws a if you attempt to use the object further. 如果相同的 COM 介面傳遞一個以上的時間從 unmanaged 到 managed 程式碼，則包裝函式上的參考計數會遞增每個階段，並呼叫傳回剩餘參考的數目。If the same COM interface is passed more than one time from unmanaged to managed code, the reference count on the wrapper is incremented every time, and calling returns the number of remaining references. 這個方法可讓您強制，使它會精確地當您想要的 RCW 參考計數版本。This method enables you to force an RCW reference count release so that it occurs precisely when you want it to. 不過，不當使用可能會導致您的應用程式失敗，或可能會造成存取違規。However, improper use of may cause your application to fail, or may cause an access violation. 假設應用程式定義域中的 managed 程式碼緊握表示的 COM 元件的 RCW。Consider a scenario in which managed code in an application domain is holding onto an RCW that represents a COM component. 如果您呼叫在 RCW 上的方法，managed 程式碼將無法存取 RCW，然後發出例外狀況。If you call the method on the RCW, the managed code will be unable to access the RCW and will raise an exception. 如果 RCW 呼叫已執行發行 RCW 時，可能會發生更嚴重的錯誤。A more serious error may occur if a call to the RCW is executing when the RCW is released. 在此情況下，沒有機會進行呼叫的執行緒會造成存取違規。In this case, there is a good chance that the thread making the call will cause an access violation. 不過，處理序記憶體可能已損毀，而且程序可能繼續執行，直到它因為很難進行偵錯的原因而失敗。However, process memory may become corrupted, and the process may continue to run until it fails for reasons that are very difficult to debug. 這項風險就更加複雜，當正在使用的 COM 元件是單一值，原因如下：CLR 啟動 COM 元件，藉由呼叫 COM [CoCreateInstance](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=142894)函式，它會傳回相同的介面指標，每次呼叫它時要執行單一 COM 元件。This risk is compounded when the COM component that is being used is a singleton, for the following reason: The CLR activates COM components by calling the COM [CoCreateInstance](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=142894) function, which returns the same interface pointer every time it is called for singleton COM components. 因此，不同且獨立的應用程式定義域中的 managed 程式碼片段可以使用相同的 RCW 單一 COM 元件，以及是否有可能是一個呼叫COM 元件上的方法，其他會中斷。Thus, separate and independent pieces of managed code in an application domain can be using the same RCW for a singleton COM component, and if either one calls the method on the COM component, the other will be broken. 因此，使用只有當絕對必要。Therefore, use the only if it is absolutely required. 如果您想要呼叫這個方法，以確保在決定時間釋放 COM 元件，請考慮使用方法改為。If you want to call this method to ensure that a COM component is released at a determined time, consider using the method instead. 將發行的基礎 COM 元件，不論它已重新進入 CLR 的次數。 will release the underlying COM component regardless of how many times it has re-entered the CLR. 內部的參考計數的 RCW 都會加一每次重新進入的 COM 元件的 CLR。The internal reference count of the RCW is incremented by one every time the COM component re-enters the CLR. 因此，您可以呼叫方法中的迴圈，直到傳回的值為零。Therefore, you could call the method in a loop until the value returned is zero. 這可達到相同結果方法。This achieves the same result as the method.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("StructureToPtr(Object, IntPtr, Boolean) may be unavailable in future releases. Instead, use StructureToPtr<T>(T, IntPtr, Boolean). For more info, go to http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=296516")

param.name: structure
param.span: 存有要封送處理之資料的 Managed 物件。

span.span: A managed object that holds the data to be marshaled.

param.span: 這個物件必須是格式化類別的結構或執行個體。

span.span: This object must be a structure or an instance of a formatted class.

param.name: ptr
param.span: Unmanaged 記憶體區塊的指標，這記憶體必須在呼叫這個方法之前被配置。

span.span: A pointer to an unmanaged block of memory, which must be allocated before this method is called.

param.name: fDeleteOld
param.span: 表示在此方法複製資料之前，在 參數上呼叫 方法。

span.span: to call the method on the parameter before this method copies the data.

param.span: 區塊必須包含有效的資料。

span.span: The block must contain valid data.

param.span: 請注意，當記憶體區塊已經包含資料時傳遞 會造成記憶體流失。

span.span: Note that passing when the memory block already contains data can lead to a memory leak.

summary.span: 從 Managed 物件封送處理資料到 Unmanaged 記憶體區塊。

span.span: Marshals data from a managed object to an unmanaged block of memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`structure`是實值類型，可以進行 boxed 處理或 unbox 處理。If `structure` is a value type, it can be boxed or unboxed. 如果會經過 boxing 處理，它會 unboxed 複製之前。If it is boxed, it is unboxed before copying. 格式化的類別是參考類型的配置由屬性，為或。A formatted class is a reference type whose layout is specified by the attribute, as either or . 複製的內容`structure`預先配置的記憶體區塊，`ptr`參數所指向。 copies the contents of `structure` to the pre-allocated block of memory that the `ptr` parameter points to. 如果`structure`含有封送處理 COM 介面指標的參考型別 (介面，而不需要配置的類別和)，受管理的物件會保持運作以參考計數。If `structure` contains reference types that marshal to COM interface pointers (interfaces, classes without layout, and ), the managed objects are kept alive with reference counts. 所有其他參考型別 （例如，字串和陣列） 會封送處理至複本時。All other reference types (for example, strings and arrays) are marshaled to copies. 若要釋放這些受管理或未受管理的物件，您必須呼叫之前釋放記憶體區塊的方法。To release these managed or unmanaged objects, you must call the method before you free the memory block. 如果您使用可在稍後的時間，將不同的執行個體複製之記憶體區塊的方法指定`true`如`fDeleteOld`移除參考計數中先前的執行個體的參考型別。If you use the method to copy a different instance to the memory block at a later time, specify `true` for `fDeleteOld` to remove reference counts for reference types in the previous instance. 否則為未受管理的複本與受管理的參考型別會有效地流失。Otherwise, the managed reference types and unmanaged copies are effectively leaked. 整體使用模式如下所示：The overall pattern for using is as follows: 1. 在第一次呼叫方法之後已配置的記憶體區塊，`fDeleteOld`必須是`false`，因為沒有任何內容，以清除。On the first call to the method after a memory block has been allocated, `fDeleteOld` must be `false`, because there are no contents to clear. > [!IMPORTANT] > 指定`true`針對`fDeleteOld`只有區塊包含有效的資料。Specify `true` for `fDeleteOld` only if the block contains valid data. 2. 如果您將不同的執行個體複製到記憶體區塊，而且此物件包含參考型別，`fDeleteOld`必須是`true`釋放舊的內容中的參考型別。If you copy a different instance to the memory block, and the object contains reference types, `fDeleteOld` must be `true` to free reference types in the old contents. 3. 如果物件包含參考類型，您必須呼叫之前釋放記憶體區塊的方法。If the object contains reference types, you must call the method before you free the memory block. > [!NOTE] > 若要釘選而不要複製現有的結構，請使用建立結構的固定控制代碼的型別。To pin an existing structure instead of copying it, use the type to create a pinned handle for the structure. 如需如何釘選的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 複製和 Pin](~/docs/framework/interop/copying-and-pinning.md)。For details on how to pin, see [Copying and Pinning](~/docs/framework/interop/copying-and-pinning.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立受管理的結構，然後將其傳輸至 unmanaged 的記憶體使用方法，然後再傳送回 managed 的記憶體使用方法。The following example creates a managed structure, transfers it to unmanaged memory using the method, and then transfers it back to managed memory using the method. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf/vb/sample.vb#1)]

static member ThrowExceptionForHR : int -> unit

param.name: errorCode
param.span: 對應於希望的例外狀況的 HRESULT。

span.span: The HRESULT corresponding to the desired exception.

summary.span: 擲回具有特定錯誤 HRESULT 值的例外狀況。

span.span: Throws an exception with a specific failure HRESULT value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立指定的失敗 HRESULT 的例外狀況物件。This method creates an exception object for the specified failure HRESULT. 如果 HRESULT 是 0 或正值 （成功碼），這個方法會傳回而不需要建立或擲回例外狀況。If the HRESULT is 0 or positive (a success code), the method returns without creating or throwing an exception. 請注意，方法會傳回根據例外狀況[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)若已設定目前執行緒的介面。Note that the method returns an exception based on the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface of the current thread if one is set. 當發生這種情況時，`errorCode`參數會被忽略。When this happens, the `errorCode` parameter is ignored. 某些失敗的 Hresult 會對應到已定義的例外狀況，而有些則不的範圍。Some failure HRESULTs map to defined exceptions, whereas others do not. 如果 HRESULT 對應至已定義的例外狀況，建立例外狀況的執行個體，並在擲回。If the HRESULT maps to a defined exception, creates an instance of the exception and throws it. 否則，它會建立的執行個體hresult，將錯誤的程式碼欄位初始化，則會擲回該例外狀況。Otherwise, it creates an instance of , initializes the error code field with the HRESULT, and throws that exception. 當會叫用，它會嘗試使用未受管理擷取關於此錯誤的額外資訊[GetErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221032\(v=vs.85\).aspx)函式。When is invoked, it attempts to retrieve extra information regarding the error by using the unmanaged [GetErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221032\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function. 每一個 hresult 與其在.NET Framework 中的可比較的例外狀況類別的對應，請參閱[How to:對應 Hresult 和例外狀況](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For the mapping from each HRESULT to its comparable exception class in the .NET Framework, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md). 有時候，可能會從先前的 COM 呼叫傳回例外狀況。Occasionally, might return an exception from a previous COM call. 在此情況下，您可以使用下列因應措施，並傳遞`IntPtr(-1)`做為第二個參數 (`errorInfo`):In this case, you can use the following workaround and pass `IntPtr(-1)` as the second parameter (`errorInfo`): ``` [SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.LinkDemand, Flags = SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode)] public static void ThrowExceptionForHR(interrorCode,IntPtrerrorInfo) ```

param.name: errorCode
param.span: 對應於希望的例外狀況的 HRESULT。

span.span: The HRESULT corresponding to the desired exception.

param.name: errorInfo
param.span: 提供錯誤詳細資訊之 [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) 介面的指標。

span.span: A pointer to the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface that provides more information about the error.

param.span: 您可以指定 IntPtr(0) 以使用目前的 [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) 介面，或指定 IntPtr(-1) 忽略目前的 [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) 介面，並且只從錯誤碼建構例外狀況。

span.span: You can specify IntPtr(0) to use the current [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface, or IntPtr(-1) to ignore the current [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface and construct the exception just from the error code.

summary.span: 根據指定的 IErrorInfo.aspx) 介面，擲回具有特定失敗 HRESULT 的例外狀況。

span.span: Throws an exception with a specific failure HRESULT, based on the specified IErrorInfo.aspx) interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立指定的失敗 HRESULT 的例外狀況物件。This method creates an exception object for the specified failure HRESULT. 如果 HRESULT 是 0 或正值 （成功碼），這個方法會傳回而不需要建立或擲回例外狀況。If the HRESULT is 0 or positive (a success code), the method returns without creating or throwing an exception. 方法會釋放`errorInfo`參數，減少 COM 參考計數[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)介面。The method releases the `errorInfo` parameter, decreasing the COM reference count of the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface. 請注意，方法會傳回根據例外狀況[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)若已設定目前執行緒的介面。Note that the method returns an exception based on the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface of the current thread if one is set. 當發生這種情況時，`errorCode`參數會被忽略。When this happens, the `errorCode` parameter is ignored. 某些失敗的 Hresult 會對應到已定義的例外狀況，而有些則不的範圍。Some failure HRESULTs map to defined exceptions, whereas others do not. 如果 HRESULT 對應至已定義的例外狀況，建立例外狀況的執行個體，並在擲回。If the HRESULT maps to a defined exception, creates an instance of the exception and throws it. 否則，它會建立的執行個體hresult，將錯誤的程式碼欄位初始化，則會擲回該例外狀況。Otherwise, it creates an instance of , initializes the error code field with the HRESULT, and throws that exception. `errorInfo`參數用來擷取關於此錯誤的額外資訊。The `errorInfo` parameter is used to retrieve extra information regarding the error. 每一個 hresult 與其在.NET Framework 中的可比較的例外狀況類別的對應，請參閱[How to:對應 Hresult 和例外狀況](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For the mapping from each HRESULT to its comparable exception class in the .NET Framework, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您直接互動 unmanaged C 樣式位元組陣列，避免複製的整個的 unmanaged 的陣列的費用 (使用) 到個別的 managed 陣列，才能設定其項目值。 enables direct interaction with an unmanaged C-style byte array, eliminating the expense of copying an entire unmanaged array (using ) to a separate managed array before setting its element values. ## Examples 下列範例會建立未受管理的記憶體區塊、 將位元組寫入 unmanaged 記憶體、 從 unmanaged 記憶體讀取位元組，然後處置 unmanaged 的記憶體。The following example creates a block of unmanaged memory, writes a byte to the unmanaged memory, reads the byte back from unmanaged memory, and then disposes the unmanaged memory. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte/vb/example.vb#1)]
